Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Detroit in 2012...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Pat Misch (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/2014, off Chien-Ming Wang (SEA)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Kansas City on 5/11/2014...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 8/7/2015...
Traded from Detroit to Seattle on 7/31/2017 (Going to DET: P J. Niemann, P E. Iglesias. Going to SEA: 2B A. Hechavarria, P E. Santana, CF D. Davis, P F. Parada, P B. Kato)...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 8/14/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/4/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
